tips.title: Te Huarahi Tīmata
tips.subTitle: Tīmata mai te hanga i ngā kaupapa ki roto ki Scratch nā te whakamātau i te akoako tuiora tangohia iho rānei te Aratohu PDF.
tips.tryGettingStarted: Whakamātau te akoako Te Huarahi Tīmata
tips.tttBody: He aha te mea e wawata ana koe ki te hanga ki a Scratch? Mā ia kawenga, māhau e whakamātau te Akoako, tangohia iho tētehi huinga o Ngā Kawenga Kāri, tirohia rānei te Aratohu Kaiwhakaako.
tips.cardsHeader: Tikina te Kohinga Katoa o Ngā Kawenga Kāri
tips.cardsBody: Ki ngā Kawenga Kāri Scratch, he mea ako ki te hanga kēmu tauwhiti, kōrero tauwhiti, waiata tauwhiti, hākoritanga tauwhiti me tēnā me tēnā!
tips.starterProjectsBody: Ki te kimi i ngā whakaaro mō ō ake hinonga, tākarohia ngā Hinonga Tīmatanga.
tips.offlineEditorBody: Ki te kore tāhau hononga ipurangi, tikiake i te pūrere ētita tuimotu ka taea ai te waihanga hinonga Scratch.
tips.questionsBody: He pātai anō āu? Tirohia Pātai ka Auau te Pātaihia haere rānei ki Āwhina me Ngā Hōtuhi Huihui-ā-ipurangi.
tile.guides: Tirohia ngā Kāri me Ngā Kupu Arataki
ttt.tutorialSubtitle: Ako ki te waihanga i tēnei hinonga, whāia ngā tohutohu o tēnei akomanga Scratch.
ttt.activitySubtitle: Mā ēnei kāri pikitia, ka toro atu i ngā tikanga waehere hou, ka taea hoki te tā.
ttt.educatorSubtitle: Whakamahia tēnei Aratohu Kaiwhakaako hei mahere, hei whakahaere hoki i te akoako, kia kotahi te hāora mō Scratch.
ttt.MakeItFlyDescription: Whakahākori mā Scratch te Ngeru, Ngā Kōtiro Pukukaha, he taco noa nei!
ttt.AnimateYourNameDescription: Whakahākoritia ngā reta o tō tohu tuakiri, kārangaranga, tino kupu rānei.
ttt.RaceDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu kia whakataetae ngā kaiwhakaari e rua ki te oma.
ttt.MakeMusicDescription: Kōwhiritia he taonga pūoro, tāpiritia he oro, pēhia ngā kī hoki ki te whakatangi.
ttt.HideAndSeekDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu tauhunahuna, ka ngaro, ka puta hoki ngā kaiwhakaari.
ttt.StoryDescription: Kōwhirihia ngā kaiwhakaari, whakaurua he kōrero, kia whai oranga tō kōrero paki.
ttt.FashionDescription: Waihangatia tētahi kēmu ka kākahutia te kaiwhakaari i ngā momo kākahu maha.
ttt.PongDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu tāwhana pōro, me ngā pūoro, piro, aha rānei.
ttt.DanceDescription: Hoahoaina he kanikani hākorikori, me ngā pūoro, me ngā takahanga waewae.
ttt.CatchDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu, kia hopu koe i ngā taonga e takataka iho i te rangi.
ttt.VirtualPetDescription: Waihangatia he mōkai pāhekoheko, ka taea te kai, te inu, te tākaro ana hoki
